title: The default value in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description:
Description: The default value in the list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the report parameter settings.
2. Set the default value of the list box to 'aaa'.
3. Modify the default value to 'bbb'.

OB: 
After modifying the default value, the list box does not retain the new default value.

EB: 
When modifying the default value in the list box, the new value should be retained.

SR: 
1. Open the report parameter settings.
2. Set the default value of the list box to 'aaa'.
3. Verify that 'aaa' is set as the default value.
4. Modify the default value to 'bbb'.
5. Verify that 'bbb' is set as the new default value in the list box.
